module.name: LCLResCache
module.short: Classes and routines used to cache interface resources.

descr.p: lclrescache.pas contains classes and routines used to cache interface resources. See graphics.pp for examples.
This file is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).

element.name: TResourceCacheItem
element.short: TResourceCacheItem - an item in a list (TResourceCache).

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.FDestroying
element.short: FDestroying - local boolean variable to store Destroying status.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.FReferenceCount
element.short: FReferenceCount - local variable to store Reference Count.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Handle
element.short: Handle for Cache Item - use TLCLHandle instead of THandle since THandle = longint under 64bit linux.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Cache
element.short: The Resource Cache to which this Cache Item belongs.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.FirstDescriptor
element.short: FirstDescriptor - the descriptor for the first item in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.LastDescriptor
element.short: LastDescriptor - the descriptor for the last item in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Next
element.short: The Next item in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Prev
element.short: Prev - the previous item in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.IncreaseRefCount
element.short: IncreaseRefCount - increment the reference count.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.DecreaseRefCount
element.short: DecreaseRefCount - decrement the reference count.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.AddToList
element.short: AddToList - add an item to the cache list specified by First, Last.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.RemoveFromList
element.short: RemoveFromList - remove an item from the cache list specified by First, Last.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.WarnReferenceHigh
element.short: WarnReferenceHigh - issue a warning if the number of references gets too high.

element.name: TResourceCacheItem.ReferenceCount
element.short: ReferenceCount - the number of references to this Item.

element.name: TResourceCacheItemClass
element.short: Class reference used to create new TResourceCacheItem instances.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor
element.short: TResourceCacheDescriptor - a class of descriptors for ResourceCache Items.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.FDestroying
element.short: FDestroying - local boolean variable to store Destroying status.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Item
element.short: Item - the Resource Cache Item to which this descriptor refers.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Cache
element.short: Cache - the resource Cache to which this Item belongs.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Next
element.short: The Next descriptor in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Prev
element.short: Prev - the Previous descriptor in the list.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.AddToList
element.short: AddToList - add a descriptor to the list specified by First, Last.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptor.RemoveFromList
element.short: RemoveFromList - remove a descriptor from the list specified by First, Last.

element.name: TResourceCacheDescriptorClass
element.short: Class reference used to create new TResourceCacheDescriptor instances.

element.name: TResourceCache
element.short: TResourceCache - a cache (linked list) for storing Resources.

element.name: TResourceCache.FDestroying
element.short: FDestroying - local boolean variable to store Destroying status.

element.name: TResourceCache.FResourceCacheDescriptorClass
element.short: FResourceCacheDescriptorClass - local variable for holding the class of the current descriptor.

element.name: TResourceCache.FResourceCacheItemClass
element.short: FResourceCacheItemClass - local variable for holding the class of the current cache item.

element.name: TResourceCache.FMaxUnusedItem
element.short: FMaxUnusedItem - how many freed resources to keep.

element.name: TResourceCache.FFirstUnusedItem
element.short: FFirstUnusedItem - local variable storing location of first free item.

element.name: TResourceCache.FLastUnusedItem
element.short: FLastUnusedItem - local variable storing location of last free item.

element.name: TResourceCache.FUnUsedItemCount
element.short: FUnUsedItemCount - local variable with count of free items.

element.name: TResourceCache.RemoveItem
element.short: RemoveItem from CacheItem list.

element.name: TResourceCache.RemoveDescriptor
element.short: RemoveDescriptor from Cache Descriptor list.

element.name: TResourceCache.ItemUsed
element.short: ItemUsed - method for signalling that the specified Item is being used.

element.name: TResourceCache.ItemUnused
element.short: ItemUnused - method for signalling that the specified Item is unused.

element.name: TResourceCache.ItemIsUsed
element.short: ItemIsUsed - returns True if specified Item is being used.

element.name: TResourceCache.Clear
element.short: Clear the current Resource Cache.

element.name: TResourceCache.CompareItems
element.short: CompareItems - returns 0 if items are equal, -1 if Item1 is less, 1 if Item1 is greater.

element.name: TResourceCache.CompareDescriptors
element.short: CompareDescriptors - returns 0 if descriptors are equal, -1 if Desc1 is less, 1 if Desc1 is greater.

element.name: TResourceCache.ConsistencyCheck
element.short: ConsistencyCheck - checks that Items have valid descriptors.

element.name: TResourceCache.MaxUnusedItem
element.short: MaxUnusedItem - the largest permitted number of unused items.

element.name: TResourceCache.ResourceCacheItemClass
element.short: ResourceCacheItemClass - the Class of the current Cache Item.

element.name: TResourceCache.ResourceCacheDescriptorClass
element.short: ResourceCacheDescriptorClass - the class of the current cache item descriptor.

element.name: THandleResourceCache
element.short: THandleResourceCache - a Resource Cache for Handles.

element.name: THandleResourceCache.FindItem
element.short: FindItem - locate the item with the specified Handle.

element.name: TBlockResourceCacheDescriptor
element.short: TBlockResourceCacheDescriptor - descriptor for a Block Resource Cache.

element.name: TBlockResourceCacheDescriptor.Data
element.short: Pointer to the Data.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache
element.short: TBlockResourceCache - a cache for Block resources.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache.FOnCompareDescPtrWithDescriptor
element.short: FOnCompareDescPtrWithDescriptor - local variable to hold the result of a comparison between a descriptor pointer and the descriptor itself.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache.FindDescriptor
element.short: FindDescriptor - returns the descriptor whose pointer is given.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache.AddResource
element.short: AddResource - inserts a Block resource into the list, referenced by a handle and a descriptor pointer, and returns the Block Resource Cache descriptor.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache.DataSize
element.short: DataSize - the total size of the data in the Block Resource.

element.name: TBlockResourceCache.OnCompareDescPtrWithDescriptor
element.short: OnCompareDescPtrWithDescriptor - the result of a comparison between a descriptor pointer and the descriptor itself.
